examples: My friends enjoyed tangy barbecue gammon skewers at the summer barbecue.
The children enjoyed a refreshing slice of watermelon on a hot summer day.
My friends enjoyed smoky beef rib chops at the countryside barbecue.
My vegetarian friend enjoyed a nourishing adzuki bean grain bowl for lunch.
The hiker enjoyed the scenic beauty of the river's gentle bends.
words.defineEn: to take pleasure or find happiness in something or someone
words.defineVi: để có niềm vui hoặc tìm thấy hạnh phúc trong một cái gì đó hoặc ai đó

examples: She gave a reading from her latest volume of poetry.
She spent the afternoon reading and was happy as a clam.

The parent instilled in their children the importance of reading and education, knowing that if your books are not read, your descendants will be ignorant, and they wanted their children to have a better chance in life.
A student who skims through a reading assignment and misses important details may struggle to understand the material and end up having to read it again.

The book club members discussed how they choose the books they read, agreeing that choosing your author as you choose your friends was important - reading was not just an intellectual exercise, but also a personal and emotional one.
words.defineEn: the act or process of looking at a written or printed piece and comprehending its meaning
words.defineVi: hành động hoặc quá trình nhìn vào một tác phẩm được viết hoặc in và hiểu ý nghĩa của nó

examples: The team finished the race in first place.
You just finished your book?
She finishes her piano practice at 7 o'clock.
I've finished my work.
She always finishes her work assignments by the end of the week.
words.defineEn: to make something end
words.defineVi: để làm cho một cái gì đó kết thúc

examples: The shoe cabinet by the entrance keeps our shoes organized and tidy.
I make my bed every morning to keep it tidy.
She cleans the bathroom regularly to keep it hygienic and tidy.
Whatever, I went hammer and tongs at it despite the fact it was already tidy.
The key to maintaining a tidy home is to follow the principle of a place for everything and everything in its place - it saves time and keeps things running smoothly.
words.defineEn: to organize a place and put things where they belong
words.defineVi: để tổ chức một nơi và đặt những thứ mà họ thuộc về

examples: Life goes on.
This dictionary goes on the top shelf.
The show must go on!
My family goes on a vacation once a year.
Shares went on sale this morning.
words.defineEn: to continue without stopping
words.defineVi: tiếp tục mà không dừng lại

examples: Long hours and tough working conditions are often par for the course in catering.
The printer is in full working order and is printing documents with high quality.
Managers selling employees the new working hours.
Despite their differences, the two business partners had a strong working relationship.
My marriage is in good working order, and my partner and I communicate well and support each other.
words.defineEn: having an occupation that provides one with a salary
words.defineVi: có một nghề nghiệp mang lại cho một người một mức lương

examples: That guy really hates my guts.
I hate shopping.
Everybody hates the sight of you.
I hate summer vacation.
Before all this, I just hated the sight of him.
words.defineEn: to really not like something or someone
words.defineVi: để thực sự không thích một cái gì đó hoặc một ai đó

examples: We're all imperfect human beings in an imperfect world.
Education for a human being is a window to the world.
As every normal human being knows, one shouldn't throw good money after bad.
Human beings are everywhere.
Human beings need relationships on every level of their lives.
words.defineEn: existence; the state of existing
words.defineVi: sự tồn tại; tình trạng hiện có

examples: Over seven hundred Facebook users have already liked the company’s website.
He likes the comfortable seats and big screen at the movie theater.
By the next morning, over twenty of my friends had liked my new profile picture.
Like the commandments written in stone.
Such helps were like drop in the ocean.
words.defineEn: to feel that someone or something is good, enjoyable, or interesting
words.defineVi: để cảm thấy rằng một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó là tốt, thú vị, hoặc thú vị

examples: That hot guy had a good head on his shoulders.
The hotel had expensive rates during the holiday season.
The group has a new CD in the pipeline.
The police had the situation well in hand.
The theatre company has several new productions in the pipeline for next season.
words.defineEn: to hold, possess, or own an object or a quality
words.defineVi: để giữ, sở hữu, hoặc sở hữu một đối tượng hoặc một chất lượng

words.defineEn: the act of stopping one's sleep
words.defineVi: hành động ngăn chặn giấc ngủ của một người

examples: Mind your own business!
You mind the cattle, Herb.
Mind if I take a rain check on that drink?
Travel broadens the mind.
My mind went totally blank.
words.defineEn: (often used in negative or question form) to be upset, annoyed or worried by something or someone
words.defineVi: (thường dùng ở thể phủ định hoặc nghi vấn) bực bội, khó chịu hoặc lo lắng vì điều gì hoặc ai đó

examples: Does this pub do lunches?
Does this pub do lunches?
Does the price include tax?
Microprocessors do the calculations in the twinkling of an eye.
The gang did a warehouse and a supermarket.
words.defineEn: to perform an action or activity that is not mentioned by name
words.defineVi: để thực hiện một hành động hoặc hoạt động không được đề cập theo tên

examples: The father and son spent a delightful afternoon playing catch in the park.
Sailors spend the better part of their time at sea.
Reputable charities spend the lion's share of donations on aid and a tiny fraction on administration.
The couple spent their vacation in a cozy cabin, billing and cooing by the fireplace.
We spent hours building structures with construction toys.
words.defineEn: to pass time in a particular manner or in a certain place
words.defineVi: để vượt qua thời gian trong một cách cụ thể hoặc ở một nơi nhất định

examples: Things like this take time.
Time is moving on.
The time passed quickly.
Time to bust a move.
The contractor is really taking their time.
words.defineEn: the quantity that is measured in seconds, minutes, hours, etc. using a device like clock
words.defineVi: số lượng được đo bằng giây, phút, giờ, v.v. bằng thiết bị như đồng hồ

examples: No talking while we flip.
No talking while you're holding a beer.
God, this talking has got to stop.
- Hey, no talking while you have a Jack attack on.
Sit down, no talking.
words.defineEn: the act of exchanging or expressing the information, feelings, or ideas that one has by speaking
words.defineVi: hành động trao đổi hoặc thể hiện thông tin, cảm xúc hoặc ý tưởng mà một người có bằng cách nói

examples: What time does the show start?
Start the engines!
The school semester starts next month.
Who started the fire?
The trail starts just outside the town.
words.defineEn: to begin doing or using something that we were not doing or using before, and continue doing or using it
words.defineVi: để bắt đầu làm hoặc sử dụng một cái gì đó mà chúng tôi đã không làm hoặc sử dụng trước đó và tiếp tục làm hoặc sử dụng nó

words.defineEn: falling like rain or in drops
words.defineVi: rơi như mưa hoặc thành từng giọt

examples: My watch has stopped.
The buck stops with him.
The car stopped at the traffic lights.
The team stopped the rot with a 5–0 win last night.
Doctors couldn't stop the bleeding.
words.defineEn: to not move anymore
words.defineVi: không di chuyển nữa

examples: I believe you have the makings of a great artist.
The deal is in the making, we're negotiating the terms.
He has all the makings of a great quarterback.
She experimented with candy making and used corn syrup to create smooth and shiny lollipops in various flavors.
I thought that there were the makings of a serious relationship, but lately it's felt like he's just playing ducks and drakes with me.
words.defineEn: the act of forming, producing, creating, or preparing something
words.defineVi: hành động hình thành, sản xuất, tạo hoặc chuẩn bị một cái gì đó

words.defineEn: to have a want for a thing or action
words.defineVi: để có một mong muốn cho một điều hoặc hành động

examples: Cooking is just not Emma's thing.
Knowledge of cooking comes easy to him.
She seasoned the meat with herbs and spices before cooking.
Apparently, Meg's cooking leaves a lot to be desired.
You can leave the cooking to me.
words.defineEn: the act of preparing food by heat or mixing different ingredients
words.defineVi: hành động chuẩn bị thức ăn bằng nhiệt hoặc trộn các thành phần khác nhau
